author: Rebecca Klar
title: Four Seasons to house New York City medical personnel
description: The Four Seasons hotel in Manhattan will provide free rooms for medical personnel responding to the coronavirus pandemic, Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D-N.Y.) said Wednesday. Cuomo said it is the first of...
content:
The Four Seasons hotel in Manhattan will provide free rooms for medical personnel responding to the coronavirus pandemic, Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D-N.Y.) said Wednesday. 
Cuomo said it is the first of many hotels he hopes will offer up rooms to healthcare workers… [+1442 chars]
